XUI wrapper for displaying different kind of messages. Message content can be a text or any valid html code.

Usage:

<xui-message type="info" [size="small"]>
    <b>message title</b> message text
</xui-message>
Attributes:
type Message type. Values: 'ok', 'success', 'error', 'info', 'hint', 'warning', 'critical'
size Message size. Values: 'small', 'normal' (default).
